name: tournament-runner
description: Paper trading tournament orchestrator for testing multiple strategy variants with objective promotion gates. Runs multi-week tournaments with daily leaderboards and performance metrics.
author: jmanhype

commands.name: check-gate
commands.description: Check if a variant meets promotion criteria

optional.TOURNAMENT_VARIANTS: Comma-separated list of variant names (default: tp_trail_1.0,tp_trail_1.5)
optional.TOURNAMENT_DAYS: Number of days to run tournament (default: 7)
